languages.text: {n}Зеленые знаки складываются в мерцающее марево, перед глазами плывет. Чем дольше вы пытаетесь постичь невозможные вычисления херетека, тем сильнее в вас чувство, что эти проклятые цифры пьют вашу душу.{/n}

{n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Зеленые знаки складываются в мерцающее марево, перед глазами плывет. Чем дольше вы пытаетесь постичь невозможные вычисления херетека, тем сильнее в вас чувство, что эти проклятые цифры пьют вашу душу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head is swimming. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger is the feeling that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

{n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}緑のシンボルがチカチカするもやに溶け込むと、あなたの頭はグラグラとし始める。異端技術の不可能な計算を理解しようとすればするほど、それらの呪われた数字が魂を蝕む感覚が強くなっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}緑のシンボルがチカチカするもやに溶け込むと、あなたの頭はグラグラとし始める。異端技術の不可能な計算を理解しようとすればするほど、それらの呪われた数字が魂を蝕む感覚が強くなっていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}绿色的符号闪烁着，仿佛变成了一片薄雾，你感觉头晕眼花。你越是想要努力理解这些完全没有道理可言的计算，就越是觉得这些被诅咒的字符打算吞噬你的灵魂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绿色的符号闪烁着，仿佛变成了一片薄雾，你感觉头晕眼花。你越是想要努力理解这些完全没有道理可言的计算，就越是觉得这些被诅咒的字符打算吞噬你的灵魂。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die grünen Symbole verschmelzen zu einem flackernden Dunst, und dir wird schwindlig. Je mehr du die unmöglichen Berechnungen des Häretekten zu verstehen versuchst, desto stärker wird das Gefühl, dass diese verfluchten Zahlen deine Seele trinken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die grünen Symbole verschmelzen zu einem flackernden Dunst, und dir wird schwindlig. Je mehr du die unmöglichen Berechnungen des Ketzers zu verstehen versuchst, desto stärker wird das Gefühl, dass die verfluchten Zahlen deine Seele trinken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les symboles verts fusionnent en un brouillard crépitant et les pensées s'embrouillent dans votre tête. Plus vous essayez de comprendre les calculs impossibles de l'hérétek, plus vous avez l'impression que ces chiffres maudits s'abreuvent de votre âme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les symboles verts fusionnent en un brouillard crépitant et les pensées s'embrouillent dans votre tête. Plus vous essayez de comprendre les calculs impossibles de l'hérétek, plus vous avez l'impression que ces chiffres maudits s'abreuvent de votre âme.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los símbolos verdes se fusionan en un resplandor titilante, y la cabeza te da vueltas. Cuanto más te afanas por comprender los imposibles cálculos del heretek, más fuerte se hace la sensación de que esos números malditos se están bebiendo tu alma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los símbolos verdes se fusionan en un resplandor titilante, y la cabeza te da vueltas. Cuanto más te afanas por comprender los imposibles cálculos del heretek, más fuerte es la sensación de que esos números malditos se están bebiendo tu alma.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yeşil semboller, yanıp sönen bir sise dönüşüyor. Zihnin bu siste yüzmeye başlıyor. Tekâfirin imkânsız hesaplamalarını algılamaya çalıştıkça bu lanetli sayıların ruhunu tükettiğine dair hissiyatın kuvvetleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The green symbols merge into a flickering haze, and your head swims. The more you try to comprehend the heretek's impossible calculations, the stronger the feeling grows that these accursed numbers are drinking your soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yeşil semboller yanıp sönen bir sise dönüşüyor ve zihnin yüzmeye başlıyor. Tekâfirin imkânsız hesaplamalarını ne kadar çok algılamaya çalışırsan, bu lanetli sayıların ruhunu içtiği hissiyatı o kadar kuvvetleniyor.{/n}
